message: I propose dividing the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. Please consider this offer.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, with me getting the larger share.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Considering the inflation, I propose a new 64/36 split. This maintains a similar distribution to the previous round while adjusting for the decrease in value of the currency. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
